pages.text: $(li)The Crying Obsidian is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/obsidian)Obsidian$(/l) that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_portal)Ruined Portals$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/crying_obsidian_armor)Crying Obsidian Armor$(/l) and the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/respawn_anchor)Respawn Anchor$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
